name: websocket_server_template
description: websocket server and client application template

scripts.teardown: npm run uninstall_package_lock && npm run uninstall_node_modules
scripts.uninstall_package_lock: rm package-lock.json && cd server && rm package-lock.json && cd ../client && rm package-lock.json
scripts.uninstall_node_modules: rm -rf node_modules && cd server && rm -rf node_modules && cd ../client && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.setup: npm i -y && cd server && npm i -y && cd ../client && npm i -y

author: todd <thickam@outlook.com>
